TopicTitle: Say Hello to the newest member of the KVOP family!

Articles.Content:
Say Hello to the newest member of the KVOP family!

Name : KVOPP-788

Category : Airplane

Max Speed : Around 500m/s

Weight : 13.71t

Description : The KVOPP-788 is a airplane designed by kola2DONO (me), it have 2 turbojet engines at the top of the wings, and can fly in a speed up to 500m/s.

The plane is inspired by the Concorde (maybe the greatest airliner ever existed), and the "flying wing body" by boeing.

The plane can take-off with a speed of around 110m/s, and have enough fuel for around 2.5 hour long flights on full throttle.

It's extremly hard to control the plane, so i recommend you to turn on SAS.

Here is some pictures of the KVOPP-788 :

Rotate!

Bye bye KSC!
